Replace.Text: The Five Elements play all things, and one Qi transforms the Three Pure Ones

There are five technologies at the beginning: gold (mining), wood (animal husbandry), water (navigation), fire (astrology), and earth (pottery). The urban cell expansion speed and urban development speed increase by 15%. Each builder created will result in 2 additional builders. Each time you create a pioneer, you will get 1 additional pioneer.

All wonders +5 [ICON_FAITH] faith, +5 [ICON_Science] technology, +5 [ICON_CULTURE] culture, +5 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, 5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity and +5 [ICON_Food] food. Builders can advance 27% of wonder progress. Owns a special building "Nantianmen"

A master who attained enlightenment and became an immortal, serving in heaven! Unlocked by technology "Scientific Theory". Has 138 [ICON_Strength] melee attack power, 150 [ICON_Ranged] ranged attack power, and 3 [ICON_Range] attack range. It can only be produced in cities with "Huaxian Pond". Killing a unit can obtain [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value equal to 333% of its attack power, as well as 33 [ICON_GreatMerchant] great merchant points and 33 [ICON_GreatScientist] great scientist points.

A special area of ​​heaven, unlocked by "Astronomy". Massive bonuses to [ICON_GOLD] gold, [ICON_Food] food, [ICON_Science] technology, [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, [ICON_CULTURE] culture, and [ICON_FAITH] faith can be obtained from the plains. And will provide 1 point of each great man point each round. There are no population requirements. There are three levels included to help the immortal go further. Requires base 199 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity and maintenance costs 1 [ICON_Gold] gold coins

Replaces the granary, adds 15 loyalty, and provides 1 [ICON_Food] food, 1 [ICON_Science] technology, 1 [ICON_CULTURE] culture, 1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, 1 [ICON_FAITH] faith and 1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin. It also provides 2 masterpiece slots, which can hold any masterpiece.

Replaces a university and provides 6 [ICON_Science] Technology, 4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, and 4 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Provides 2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity and 4 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points.

A special area of ​​heaven, unlocked by "Astronomy". Massive bonuses to [ICON_GOLD] gold, [ICON_Food] food, [ICON_Science] technology, [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, [ICON_CULTURE] culture, and [ICON_FAITH] faith can be obtained from the plains. And will provide 1 point of each great man point each round. There are no population requirements. There are three levels included to help the immortal go further. Requires base 199 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity and maintenance costs 1 [ICON_Gold] gold coins

A master who attained enlightenment and became an immortal, serving in heaven! Unlocked by technology "Scientific Theory". Has 138 [ICON_Strength] melee attack power, 150 [ICON_Ranged] ranged attack power, and 3 [ICON_Range] attack range. It can only be produced in cities with "Huaxian Pond". Killing a unit can obtain [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value equal to 333% of its attack power, as well as 33 [ICON_GreatMerchant] great merchant points and 33 [ICON_GreatScientist] great scientist points.

Replaces the granary, adds 15 loyalty, and provides 1 [ICON_Food] food, 1 [ICON_Science] technology, 1 [ICON_CULTURE] culture, 1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, 1 [ICON_FAITH] faith and 1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin. It also provides 2 masterpiece slots, which can hold any masterpiece.

Replaces a university and provides 6 [ICON_Science] Technology, 4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, and 4 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Provides 2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity and 4 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points.
+{1_num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold coins come to the plains
+{1_num} [ICON_FAITH] Faith value comes to the plains
+{1_num} [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and technology value comes to the plains
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture value comes to the plain

The Jade Emperor, sitting high in the sky! The sun and moon are under your feet, the stars obey your orders, and the mountains and rivers are crawling in front of you! From Jiutian to Jiuyou, from Bahuang to Liuhe, no one knows your name, Great Heavenly Lord!
How good! I am very happy with your tribute.
scare! How dare you show up in front of me without respecting etiquette?
I am the Supreme God of the Haotian Golden Tower, the Natural Wonderful Being Milo, the True Jade Emperor, the Lord of the Three Realms, and I am called the Great Heavenly Lord. Who are you?
You are endowed with merit and virtue, but you clearly know the immortal world. I wonder what your intention is?
good! My heart is very happy.
Countless calamities! I am so gray!
Huh, I don't like it very much.
good! You can share the peach feast with me.
If you don't know how to count, you are not worthy of being my friend.
The five virtues are complete, merits and virtues form a wheel, and you are a king and even a human being! I wonder if you would like to discuss the Tao with me?
good! This is the observation of the way of heaven, and the two of us are friends.
If I had known, you and other demons outside the realm would cause trouble in the three realms if you did not correct your consequences! This is your calamity!
You devils are deceived, do not know destiny, and follow the cause and effect of life. I will send you to ashes today!
You may know where the court of tomorrow is, and I also know where you are. What do you think?
Nine Heavens Thunder Tribulation and Ascension to Heaven
The immortals face the disaster. After success, they can ascend to the fairyland, +31 [ICON_Strength] combat power and 1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.
Heaven and earth live together and three flowers gather together

Three flowers gather at the top, the Golden Immortal has the same lifespan as the heaven and the earth, and is promoted to the Golden Immortal Realm, with +51 [ICON_Strength] combat power and can move after attacking.
Hidden in the heart of Daluo Daoguo
Underworld, free and easy, promoted to Daluo Daoguo, +101 [ICON_Strength] combat power and 1 [ICON_Range] range
Do good deeds and enjoy traveling. Now I know your business!
You act perversely, do not uphold your destiny, do not care for the people, and do not deserve to be a son of man!
To cultivate life, there is no cause and effect. I will give you a pair of boys. Are you willing?
They like civilizations with high livability and are hostile to civilizations with low livability.
There is peace under your rule
Under your rule, people are angry and resentful
snort! The evil heretics are so arrogant! In the future, when the heavens and the earth collapse, your true spirit will disappear and you will never be restored again!
